entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:21 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 10:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -23.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 39 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -33.1°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
